scripts.build: npm run build-server && npm run build-assets
scripts.build:full: npm run build-server && parallelshell 'npm run build-vendors' 'npm run build-worker' 'npm run build-assets' 'npm run build-styles'
scripts.build:production: npm run build-server && parallelshell 'npm run build-vendors' 'npm run build-worker' 'npm run build-assets:production' 'npm run build-styles'
scripts.build-vendors: browserify -r react-dom -r react-router -r react-addons-shallow-compare -r react-addons-css-transition-group -r lodash --debug -p [ minifyify --map './vendors.map' --output 'assets/script/vendors.map' ] > assets/script/vendors.js
scripts.build-assets: browserify -x react-dom -x react-router -x react-addons-shallow-compare -x react-addons-css-transition-group -x lodash --extension=.js --extension=.jsx --debug -t [ babelify --presets [es2015 stage-0 react] --plugins [transform-decorators-legacy transform-runtime add-module-exports] ] assets/script/index.js > assets/script/index.bundle.js
scripts.build-assets:production: export NODE_ENV=production && browserify -x react-dom -x react-router -x react-addons-shallow-compare -x react-addons-css-transition-group -x lodash --extension=.js --extension=.jsx --debug -p [ minifyify --map './index.bundle.map' --output 'assets/script/index.bundle.map' ] -t envify -t [babelify --presets [es2015 stage-0 react] --plugins [transform-decorators-legacy transform-runtime add-module-exports] ] assets/script/index.js > assets/script/index.bundle.js
scripts.build-worker: browserify --debug -p [ minifyify --map './highlight.bundle.map' --output 'assets/script/highlight.bundle.map' ] -t envify -t [babelify --presets [es2015 stage-0 react] --plugins [transform-decorators-legacy transform-runtime add-module-exports] ] assets/script/highlight.js > assets/script/highlight.bundle.js
scripts.build-styles: parallelshell 'lessc --npm-import --autoprefix="ie 10,last 2 versions" --clean-css assets/style/light.less > assets/style/light.css' 'lessc --npm-import --autoprefix="ie 10, last 2 versions" --clean-css assets/style/dark.less > assets/style/dark.css'
scripts.watch: npm run watch-server & npm run watch-assets
scripts.babel: npm run clean && babel source --out-dir ./ --source-maps inline
scripts.clean: rm -rf application configuration binary library assets/script
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run build:production
